amendment.description: To retain jurisdiction over the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968, with the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4038 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 4038 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Shelby. (consideration: CR S10664; text: CR S10664) To retain jurisdiction over the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968, with the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4038 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4038 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Shelby.
